name: Recognition
description:
Discover your identity and find your way home in this old style text adventure.

Some useful commands are x or examine to look at your surroundings (e.g. examine flower), and pick up or take to add items to your inventory. You can also eat or even lick various things. Open your inventory by typing in i or inv.

You'll need to uncover your memories by examining different items on this world, and combine all of the pieces of a code to allow your escape.
